The Combat System that Jeb has been working on will be added to all platforms, not just Java, it's just that testing the same changes on all of them at the same system when the Combat is still in earlir stages and with so many constant changes would make it difficult to test it! Focusing the tests in Java makes it easier to add it to Bedrock later, don't forget that Bedrock is for many platforms while Java is only one, so it's much easier to test things in Java
